Ive been doing this all day and nothing seems to work. I wiped everything I had and tried one last time, got no$gba, and downloaded your game file. I got all the codes in and replaced but it freezes when I hit new game. help?

@gst 
1.Have you tried using Desmume? 

2.Also make sure that the settings in the readme are the same in the no$gba .ini

3.make sure the settings are flash512K for the NDS Cartidge Backup Media, no cash(or opengl for better quality), Sound is on, and the code is activated then game is resetted.

4. If none of these helped you, I'm sorry I couldn't assist you but if a save file is all you need, I'll be happy to upload a save file for you.
How do I change the codes?
@Roroos press f2 add new, then paste the code, action replay code(AR), then create, double click to activate, reset emulator. :)
